meanings.definition: A small freshwater fish of the family Poeciliidae, typically found in shallow waters.
meanings.sent1: The topminnows swam gracefully in the clear pond.
meanings.sent2: I saw a school of topminnows near the riverbank.
meanings.sent3: Why did the topminnows organize a talent show? To see who could swim the fastest!
meanings.sent4: The topminnows glittered like jewels in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The children were delighted to spot the colorful topminnows darting around.

meanings.definition: The plural form of topminnow, referring to multiple individuals of this species.
meanings.sent1: We counted ten topminnows swimming together in the stream.
meanings.sent2: The topminnows in the aquarium seemed to be enjoying their new environment.
meanings.sent3: What did the topminnows do when they won the lottery? They splurged on a deluxe fish tank!
meanings.sent4: The topminnows moved in unison, creating a mesmerizing dance in the water.
meanings.sent5: The topminnows' vibrant colors stood out among the other fish in the pond.
